# firezone Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "firezone" {
  endpoint = "https://api.firezone.io/v1"
  api_key  = var.firezone_api_key
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Firezone API key
- `endpoint` (String) Firezone API endpoint
